title: GraphQL schema and queries package
description: Create `app/graphql/queries/__init__.py` re-exporting Query from health.py. Create empty `app/graphql/mutations/__init__.py` with empty Mutation class. Implement `app/graphql/schema.py` combining Query and Mutation into Strawberry schema. Export schema object.
acceptance_criteria:
- queries/__init__.py exports Query
- mutations/__init__.py exports empty Mutation stub
- schema.py creates strawberry.Schema(query=Query, mutation=Mutation)
- schema exported and importable
